alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Volusia County through 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bunnell to 11 miles northeast of Barberville to 7 miles west of Daytona International Speedway. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, Ormond Beach, Holly Hill, Ormond-By-the-Sea and Ormond Beach Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
